Uses of Interface
controller.Command

  • Packages that use Command 
    Package Description
    controller  
    view  

    • Uses of Command in controller

      Classes in controller that implement Command 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CommandsManager.displayCrossSectionCommand
      displayCrossSectionCommand class implement Command interface and override the doCommand method gets from the CLI(user input) the name of the maze the section(x,y,z) and an index.
      class  CommandsManager.DisplayMazeCommand
      DisplayMazeCommand class implement Command interface and override the doCommand method get the name from the Cli(user input) and display the maze to the output.
      class  CommandsManager.displayMazeSolutionCommand
      displayMazeCommand Class implement Command interface and override the doCommand method loads a maze from a file using MyModel method getMazeSolution to get the solution for the maze using MyView method displayMazeSolution to display the solution to the output
      class  CommandsManager.exitCommand
      exitCommand Class implement Command interface and override the doCommand method terminated the program and all threads using MyModel method exit to terminat all threads
      class  CommandsManager.GenerateMazeCommand
      GenerateMazeCommand class implement Command interface and override the doCommand method generate a maze while given a name and the desired size of levels,column and rows of the maze.
      class  CommandsManager.getPathCommand
      getPathCommand Class implement Command interface and override the doCommand method displays all the files and folders in a specific path in the computer.
      class  CommandsManager.loadMazeCommand
      loadMazeCommand Class implement Command interface and override the doCommand method loads a maze from a file using MyModel method loadMaze
      class  CommandsManager.saveMazeCommand
      saveMazeCommand class implement Command interface and override the doCommand method save a maze into a file uses MyModel saveCompressMaze method to save the maze into the file
      class  CommandsManager.solveMaze3dCommand
      solveMazeCommand Class implement Command interface and override the doCommand method solves the maze using the desired search algorithm('BFS' or 'DFS') using MyModel method solveMaze3d to solve the maze
      Methods in controller that return types with arguments of type Command 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Command> CommandsManager.getCommandsMap()
      GetCommandMap method puts all the commands in a list(hashMap) and returns it.

    • Uses of Command in view

      Method parameters in view with type arguments of type Command 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void View.setCommands(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Command> commands) 
      void MyView.setCommands(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Command> commands)
      setCommands method sets all the command to the user command line interface
      void CLI.setCommands(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Command> commands)
      setCommands method sets the commands on the hashMap commands
